Text: Can you provide information on the software and other hardware in your recording chain? Turntable? Phono pre-amp? Amplifier? Interconnects? Sound card? Recording software? Additional information might be useful in our evaluation of what we're hearing.
Technics SL-Q202 (turntable) > Cambridge Audio Azur 640P (preamp) > E-MU 0404 (PCI) > Sound Forge (software)
